POI.info: Use Engineer Rifle 5: Jump Shot or the Experimental Rifle to jump across.
Jump requires the Experimental Rifle, Engineer Rifle 5: Jump Shot or 600+ Range Leap.
Jump requires the Experimental Rifle or a 900 Range Leap.

Trail.trailData: Data/LadyElyssa/Jumping Puzzle - Shortcut/Not So Secret 2 - Rifle.trl

POI.info: Requires the Experimental Rifle or a 900 range leap to proceed. Engineer Rifle 5: Jump Shot no longer works.
Use the Experimental Rifle or a 900 Range Leap to jump across.
